request.prompt: Design a 4-floor residential building with parking

mumbai_residential.curl_command:
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/v1/generate \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "user_id": "demo_user",
    "prompt": "Design a 4-floor residential building with parking",
    "project_id": "demo_mumbai_001",
    "city": "Mumbai"
  }' | jq

request.prompt: Create an IT office campus with 3 buildings

pune_it_park.curl_command:
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/v1/generate \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "user_id": "demo_user",
    "prompt": "Create an IT office campus with 3 buildings",
    "project_id": "demo_pune_001",
    "city": "Pune"
  }' | jq
